title: Ep. 946 - Achievement Unlocked: I'm A "Conspiracy Theorist"
description:
Slate publishes a defamatory article about your favorite podcast host, Democrat polling shows that “culture war” issues are big winners for Republicans, and China censors “Friends,” proving that even a stopped clock is right twice a day.
Check out my shop page to purchase shirts, stickers, and books (one with words, one without) https://utm.io/uedo1
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
TONIGHT: Huck Finn meets Ben Shapiro on tonight’s gathering of Third Thursday Book Club! Join now to be a part of the Q&A at 8pm ET / 7pm CT: thirdthursdaybookclub.com
Subscribe to The Daily Wire and stream our newest movie SHUT IN, already with a 97% audience score on Rotten Tomatoes: https://utm.io/uehf3
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
